name: ammo.js
description: Direct port of the Bullet physics engine to JavaScript using Emscripten
author: Alon Zakai <alonzakai@gmail.com>

scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:js+wasm && npm run build:export
scripts.build:partial: npm run build:js+wasm && npm run build:export
scripts.build:export: npm run generate && mkdir -p dist && cp builds/ammo* dist/
scripts.test: npm run test-js && npm run test-wasm
